Letter 1, 1873
     604. We have always used a little milk and some sugar. This we have never denounced, either in our writings or in our preaching. We believe cattle will become so much diseased that these things will yet be discarded, but the time has not yet come for sugar and milk to be wholly abolished from our tables. 
     [USE OF MILK AND SUGAR TOGETHER, SEE "MILK AND SUGAR," SECTION XIX]
